    • game

      public int[][] game() throws NumberFormatException, IOException
      Overrides gol.game() Runs a simulation tick.
      Returns:
      The next tick of the simulation, null if the end of the simulation is reached
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - - this happens when user inputs something that cannot be interpreted as integer
      IOException - - throw this exception when then file path does not open for writing correctly

    • GolAPI

      public void GolAPI​(String usr_file_name) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      GUI API for Game of Life. Initializes all requirements for gol class.
      Parameters:
      usr_file_name - - the seed file name
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - - this happens when user inputs something that cannot be interpreted as integer
      IOException - - throw this exception when then file path does not open for writing correctly
      FileNotFoundException
